prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies the essence of nightmares and shadows.
I want a dark-type Pokemon with a ghostly appearance and an aura of mystery.
Generate a legendary Pokemon with a sleek, shadowy body and wispy white features.
Make a Pokemon that can haunt dreams, featuring shades of black and grey.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in the darkness, with a unique ethereal design.
Design a powerful creature that manipulates nightmares, adorned with dark colors.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the balance between dreams and nightmares.
